TopicTitle: Leaving and returning to an SOI

Articles.Content: What is the cheapest way to leave and then return to the same SOI?  My first thought is to have ejection angles of either 0 or 180° to prograde, but maybe 90° is better?  I have a contract that I will need to move a station from Ike to Duna SOI, but I want to put it back in Ike's orbit.

If you just barely exit an SOI prograde, then you are moving a little faster than the body you just left by definition. Which makes you move into a slightly higher orbit of the parent body. Which slows you down. Which automatically recaptures you into the SOI you just left with no dV at all.
